body_html:
(I am on Gunan's team, hoping to help out with Docker things.)

Naive question: what's the use case for Jupyter? If the -devel images are for developing on TF and the non-devel images are for developing with TF, does it make more sense for Jupyter to only be in the non-devel images (or in an image to itself?)
body_text:
(I am on Gunan's team, hoping to help out with Docker things.)
Naive question: what's the use case for Jupyter? If the -devel images are for developing on TF and the non-devel images are for developing with TF, does it make more sense for Jupyter to only be in the non-devel images (or in an image to itself?)
body:
(I am on Gunan's team, hoping to help out with Docker things.)

Naive question: what's the use case for Jupyter? If the -devel images are for developing on TF and the non-devel images are for developing *with* TF, does it make more sense for Jupyter to only be in the non-devel images (or in an image to itself?)
